[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat Topology Filter

abbrev omnimath890_answer : ℕ := sorry
theorem omnimath890
: IsGreatest
{a : ℕ | ∃ b c : ℕ, a > 0 ∧ b > 0 ∧ c > 0 ∧ a + b + c = GCDMonoid.gcd a b + GCDMonoid.gcd b c + GCDMonoid.gcd c a + 120}

Output cuts off here.. Expected Answer Type: ℕ
<<<if 120 ≠ 119 then 119 else 119>>>

The maximum value satisfying the sum of gcds plus 120 is 119, given enumeration hints.
